Write a story about a raindrop that is rejected by a flower because it is too big and decides to go on a journey to find a smaller flower to fit in with.
Write a story about a raindrop that falls into a puddle and watches as the world goes by before finally deciding to join in and play a part in the world.
Write a story about a raindrop that falls on a leaf and goes on a journey to find a new home and starts a new life.
Write a story about a raindrop that falls into a river and goes on a journey to find its way to the ocean.
Write a story about a raindrop that falls on a city and goes on a journey to find its place in the urban landscape.
